name: Blockbuster Timer
description:
Opened up your Blockbuster Game only to find out that you’ve got a busted buzzer? No need to worry – this app has everything you need to get the timer ticking and the game back on track. Featuring one timer for the Head-to-Head Round, and another for the Charades Round.

PLEASE NOTE: This timer is intended to be used with the Blockbuster Party Game by Big Potato. Without the game, this timer won’t be much use – unless you like making car horn noises.

The Blockbuster Game is made by Big Potato, an indie board game company from East London. Blockbuster is a super-simple party game for anyone who’s ever seen a movie. And just like all great blockbusters, this one’s a double bill!

Start off with a head-to-head challenge, where two players will face off against one another in a quick-fire buzzer battle, then move onto the second round: a movie charades challenge with a twist. First team to collect a movie from each genre are the winners and the new Blockbuster big shots.
